newsitem.title: USA: HMT Technology sees Q4 revs below yr-ago.
newsitem.headline: HMT Technology sees Q4 revs below yr-ago.

text.p: HMT Technology Corp said Tuesday it expects revenues for its fourth fiscal quarter, ended March 31, will be below year-ago levels.
The company said in a statement it expects to post fourth quarter net sales of about $63.4 million, below sales of $65 million in the comparable year-ago quarter.

In the third quarter HMT posted revenues of $61.2 million. The company said fourth quarter gross margins are expected to drop to between 34 percent and 37 percent, down from 40.6 percent reported in the third quarter. The drop was due to lower initial yields from the manufacture of new products.
HMT plans to report its results on April 22.
